name: Dungeon of Doom
overview: An RPG adventure game from the book "Write Your Own Fantasy Games for Your Microcomputer". Deep below the ground lies the dungeons of the ruined castle Crekkan. In it lies the magic idol, stolen from the villagers by an evil wizard. Many adventurers have tried to retrieve this magic idol, but so far, none have returned, except one. Before dying, he told of hoards of monsters and traps. The villagers are getting worried as if the evil wizard returns he will surely use the idol to take over the village. Are you ready to try?
